snippet: The United States and the European Union need to support Kiev unwaveringly and maintain demands on Russia.
abstract: Editorial urges United States to maintain sanctions imposed on Russia; argues without pressure from the West, Russia has little incentive to make any concessions to Ukraine; holds Russian Pres Vladimir Putin still wants to keep Ukraine weak and out of NATO and European Union; says Ukraine needs long-term support, including sanctions, to achieve its goals.
lead_paragraph: The United States and the European Union need to support Kiev unwaveringly and maintain demands on Russia.

headline.seo: To Give Ukraine a Chance, Sanctions on Russia Must Continue
headline.main: Keeping the Pressure on Mr. Putin
headline.print_headline: Keeping the Pressure on Mr. Putin
